caption.body: "Behind the world of the artisan is…that desire to take an inanimate material, and bring it to life in a form or image that will sing out; that desire to pay homage to my surroundings, to my creativity; that thanksgiving to that first bite into the apple of awareness." - Michael Lloyd (b. 1950)  Vase made in memory of John Andrew’s mother  2018 Michael Lloyd (b. 1950) Edinburgh Britannia silver, parcel-gilt The Pearson Silver Collection L2018.1801.018  Special thanks to The Pearson Silver Collection. "A Sterling Renaissance: British Silver Design 1957 to 2018" is on display, pre-security, in the International Terminal. http://bit.ly/BritishSilver
